title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 §§ 641-1.1 - Rate Setting For Non-State Providers
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 §§ 641-1.1 - Rate Setting For Non-State Providers

State Regulations

Rates of reimbursement for residential habilitation
services provided in community residences, including IRAs, and for day
habilitation services, other than those provided by OPWDD, shall be determined
in accordance with Title 10 NYCRR
86-10.The rates of payment made for services
rendered to title XIX recipients established in accordance with the methodology
contained in this Title10 NYCRR Part
86
-
10
shall be contingent upon Federal
financial participation (FFP) and approval. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14
§§
641-1.1

New

York State Register May 5, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 18, eff. 5/5/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
